title: LinkedIn Learning Essential Training Challenge
description: Complete essential training courses on LinkedIn Learning for Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Dimension, Figma, CSS, and HTML. This challenge is designed to build a strong foundation in design and web development tools.
requirements: Dedication to complete all essential training courses

title: Halloween Themed Illustration Challenge
description: Create a Halloween-themed illustration using any medium of your choice. The illustration should capture the spirit of Halloween and can include elements like pumpkins, ghosts, witches, or any other spooky theme. Students are encouraged to be creative and think outside the box.
requirements: Basic knowledge of illustration tools (e.g., Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Procreate)

title: Project Revision & Badge Challenge
description: Take your instructor's feedback on a project and implement the revisions. Present the updated project to your instructor for review. If you successfully update your project and include it in your portfolio, you will earn a badge sticker, and your work will be showcased.
requirements: Completion of a project with instructor feedback
Incorporation of revisions into the project
